statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: When you go shopping, you can search in repository for avalible merchandises by the computers and internet. First you give the search system a name about something, then the system responds with the results. Now you are given a lot merchandise names in repository and some queries, and required to simulate the process.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: There is only one case. First there is an integer P (1<=P<=10000)representing the number of the merchanidse names in the repository. The next P lines each contain a string (it's length isn't beyond 20,and all the letters are lowercase).Then there is an integer Q(1<=Q<=100000) representing the number of the queries. The next Q lines each contains a string(the same limitation as foregoing descriptions) as the searching condition.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each query, you just output the number of the merchandises, whose names contain the search string as their substrings.

statement.title: Sample Input
statement.content:
20
ad
ae
af
ag
ah
ai
aj
ak
al
ads
add
ade
adf
adg
adh
adi
adj
adk
adl
aes
5
b
a
d
ad
s

statement.title: Source
statement.content: 2009 Multi-University Training Contest 4 - Host by HDU
